snippet: The president will announce initiatives as part of a broader campaign for new limits on pollution from coal-fired power plants.
abstract: Pres Obama will announce handful of executive actions and private and nonprofit groups' investments in energy efficiency and renewable energy; initiatives will not amount to much in terms of energy policy or their impact on global warming, but are part of broader campaign to build public support for Environmental Protection Agency rule limiting carbon pollution from coal-fired power plants; rule is expected to create new market for zero-carbon energy from sources like wind and solar.
lead_paragraph: The president will announce initiatives as part of a broader campaign for new limits on pollution from coal-fired power plants.

headline.main: Obama to Give Push on Climate
headline.print_headline: Obama to Give Push on Climate
